text:
Doing something no one has ever done before...
How about that? Isn't it wonderful?

So, for me, if it's us...
If it's HO-KA-GO CLIMAX GIRLS...

I think we can embody "recklessness"...
That's what I believe.
Because, you know, we've already come this far!

Initially, no one paid attention to us or had any
expectations... But now, it's different.

There are plenty of people supporting us...
And looking forward to what we'll do.

I see.
I understand, with reasons that are very Natsuha-like.
Hehe, I'm glad you get it.

...Natsuha, were you always like this...
Since you were a child?

...I wonder.
For me, it just feels natural...

So, Natsuha has always been
Natsuha since you can remember?

It was indeed that long ago.
I don't think I was clearly aware of it...

But gradually, you start to understand what adults say, right?
Both the things they expect of you and the things they don't...

So, I started feeling like, "I'll show you"...
And eventually, I became who I am.

Hehe...
There are so many things I want to show you, too.

For example, even now!
...In this moment, I'm still growing.
